'''''A Walnut Tree Amidst the Gardens''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Khayyam's Final Words]]''.
